meanings.definition: Full of or characterized by feasting or abundance.
meanings.sent1: The feastful table was overflowing with delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The holiday season always brings a feastful atmosphere to our home.
meanings.sent3: The feastful gathering turned into a joyful celebration.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the feastful hall, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The feastful garden was a paradise of colors and scents.

meanings.definition: Inclined to or fond of feasting.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the most feastful person in the village.
meanings.sent2: The feastful family always hosted the best dinner parties.
meanings.sent3: His feastful nature made him the life of every party.
meanings.sent4: The feastful cat eagerly awaited its mealtime every day.
meanings.sent5: Their feastful traditions brought the community together in joy.
